bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Functional Methods and Equipment for Measuring the Performance of Dial-Pulse (DP) Address Signaling Systems
IEEE Standard Functional Methods and Equipment for Measuring the Performance of Dial-Pulse (DP) Address Signaling Systems

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The following topics are dealt with: IEEE standard functional method; dial-pulse address signaling system; performance measurement; limited-performance instruments; general-purpose instruments; high-performance instruments; dial pulse address signaling technique.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
